boat.full_description:
With her hull built in 1987, 'Persis' was completed in Leicestershire and launched in 1990.

Since 2004 she has sailed the English Channel, France and West Country coasts crossing to the Isles of Scilly. Moving to Ireland in 2009, she has sailed the Irish coast from the Kenmare River including a circumnavigation of Ireland in 2015. In 2019 she changed owner and sailing area to the Netherlands. Markermeer, Ijsselmeer and Waddensea where beaching is common.
boat.name: Persis

ownerships.note: 'Persis' was sold in Spring 2019 and moved to the Netherlands.

boat.short_description: 'Persis' was built in 1987, a Cornish Crabber Pilot Cutter 30. In 2014 she sailed to Falmouth via the Isles of Scilly to see the Pilot Cutter Championships in St Mawes.
